text: Farahnaz Pahlavi (; born 12 March 1963) is the eldest daughter of Mohammad Reza Pahlavi by his third wife, Farah Diba. In a 2004 article in Los Angeles Times, she tried to work at an international aid agencies such as UNICEF, but was rejected because of her name. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Iranian princes and princesses Category:People from Tehran
title: Farahnaz Pahlavi
